product_name: Sunlite Utili-T Air Floor Pump with Gauge - 2013 Overstock
long_description: A biking essential with an easy-to-read gauge for accuracy, the Sunlite Utili-T Air Floor Pump with Gauge offers reliable inflation at a great price. Durable steel barrel and sturdy base provide smooth pumping and stability. Includes a Schrader valve with a thumblock and an adapter for Presta valves. Overstock.
short_description: A biking essential with an easy-to-read gauge for accuracy, the Sunlite Utili-T Air Floor Pump with Gauge offers reliable inflation at a great price.
